Tom Leinster wrote:

The School of Mathematics at the University of Edinburgh is advertising two three-year post-doc positions for Pure Mathematics. The suggested start date is in Autumn 2026 but is flexible. The application deadline is 1 December.

https://elxw.fa.em3.oraclecloud.com/hcmUI/CandidateExperience/en/sites/CX_1001/job/13344

Please apply, or encourage potential candidates to apply!

See https://hodge.maths.ed.ac.uk/?page_id=22 for our
Algebra/Category Theory/Geometry/Number Theory group, https://maths.ed.ac.uk/research/structure-symmetry/mathematical-physics for our mathematical physics group, and https://maths.ed.ac.uk/ for information about the entire School.

Best wishes,
Tom
